long_description: When you're out for a run or on the approach to a winter climb, the lightweight Black Diamond Pilot soft-shell gloves will keep your fingers comfortable and maintain good dexterity. Wind-resistant nylon shells have 4-way stretch for great mobility and dexterity. Grab your ice tools or ski poles with the grippy goat leather palms. Bonded, brushed tricot lining wicks moisture and is comfortable next to skin. Black Diamond Pilot gloves have neoprene cuffs.
short_description: When you're out for a run or on the approach to a winter climb, the lightweight Black Diamond Pilot soft-shell gloves will keep your fingers comfortable and maintain good dexterity.
